amendment.description: To require a report on the efforts of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency to utilize certain data extraction and exploitation capabilities within the Commercial Joint Mapping Tool Kit (C/JMTK).

vote.text: Amendment SA 784 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 784 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss. (consideration: CR S6838; text: CR S6838) To require a report on the efforts of the National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency to utilize certain data extraction and exploitation capabilities within the Commercial Joint Mapping Tool Kit (C/JMTK).
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 784 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 784 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chambliss.
